title: Bad Timing
alt: Protip: Even without the red spiders, never have that conversation halfway through a balloon ride.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan, flying in a hot air balloon.]
Cueball: I like you. I'm just not feeling the relationship.Cueball: I'm sorry.Cueball: It's just bad timing. Me with my classes, you with your work, the spiders...
Megan: The what?[Red Spiders crowd onto balloon, causing it to fall. Cueball and Megan look panicked]
